channel.title: ATLAS Open Data
channel.description: Recent content on ATLAS Open Data

item.description: General information The ATLAS Open Data is hosted in the ATLAS Open Data website, as well as in the CERN Open Data website and are attributed separate DOI’s that allow their citation. The main ATLAS-approved documents meant to be a guide on the content, properties, capabilities and limitations of the two released datasets: The ATL-OREACH-PUB-2020-001 for the 13 TeV samples The ATL-OREACH-PUB-2016-001 and ATL-OREACH-PUB-2018-001 for the 8 TeV samples.
